title: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo
overview: Kindaichi Hajime is a high school student and a private detective with an IQ of 180. He solves murder cases that are riddled with difficult clues. Kindaichi Hajime works with his childhood friend Nanase Miyuki and Kenmochi Isamu. Kenmochi Isamu is now the chief inspector of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department.This is the 5th generation of Kindaichi Shonen no Jikenbo live-action TV series.
